title: Matt Hancock – 2016 Speech on Technology and Innovation
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Matt Hancock, the Minister for the Cabinet Office, at the Keith Joseph Memorial Lecture at the CPS in London on 8 June 2016.
content:
It is a huge honour to give this lecture in the memory of the great Sir Keith Joseph.
